section: Purpose 3. The exclusive purpose of the Venture (the "Purpose") will be IT Development. internet Back office Maintenance And Deployment of medical Service. This purpose may be changed at any time at the discretion of BorrowMoney.com, inc.
explanation: The initial part of this clause defines the purpose of the joint venture. However, the final sentence gives BorrowMoney.com, inc. the unilateral right to change the purpose at any time. This contradicts the concept of a *joint* venture, where major strategic decisions should ideally be made jointly, or at least with some consultation or consideration of all members' interests. This effectively nullifies any agreement on the purpose, leading to operational uncertainty. It provides BorrowMoney.com, inc. with too much power, potentially allowing them to change the purpose in a way that is detrimental to JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go.

section: Member Duties Description BorrowMoney.com, inc *HTML code, build, deploy and maintain all technical aspect requirements including a database for medical dispatch personal & product service as needed, including activity information, data storage and backup. provided by three qualified assigned Borrowmoney.com, inc. employees/personal JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go $60,000.00 USD From Monthly Government , City And State, And Or Private Awarded Contracts. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue From Awarded Contract, In Addition to The Total Contributions.
explanation: This clause outlines the duties of each member. However, the description of BorrowMoney.com, inc.'s duties lacks specificity. The phrase "HTML code, build, deploy and maintain all technical aspect requirements" is too vague. What constitutes "technical aspect requirements"? This ambiguity creates uncertainty and could lead to disputes later on if the parties disagree on the scope of BorrowMoney.com, inc.'s responsibilities. More detail or an exhibit outlining these requirements is necessary. Also, note the asterisk at the beginning of the description is unusual and potentially a typographical error, but it contributes to the general lack of clarity.

section: Amendments 29. This Agreement may be amended with the consent of BorrowMoney.com, inc., notwithstanding any objection from JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go.
explanation: This clause allows BorrowMoney.com, inc. to unilaterally amend the agreement, regardless of JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go's objections. This directly contradicts the principle of a 'joint' venture, as it gives disproportionate power to one member. Amendments should require the consent of all members to ensure a fair balance of power and protect the interests of all parties. This creates a power imbalance and makes JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go vulnerable to amendments that could harm their interests. Such a provision might even be viewed negatively by a court because it so overwhelmingly favors one party.
